EAST ASIAN FINANCIAL CRISIS —
 AN AGENDA FOR ECONOMIC RECOVERY
Pradumna B. Rana
February 1999
Pradumna B. Rana is a senior economist at the Economic Analysis and Research
Division. The views expressed are those of the author and do not reflect the views of
the Asian Development Bank.
